channel.title: Server Status [Read More]
channel.description:
Why do people post servers on the "Server Status Checker" area, when they don't put a website or forums?
Moparscape should really put a rule saying, at least forums link should be added...

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“ChelseaGrin, post:6, topic:525001”]All that’s going to do is remove it, or even better (sarcasm), warn the person…

I am not asking for a smart ass remark, I am asking MOPAR if they would think about pushing a new registering of a server rule, as the have to put forums or client links (that actually work)…[/quote]
then why did you bother posting it here? This is discussion, not your personal suggestion section. We have a suggestion section for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“ChelseaGrin, post:6, topic:525001”]All that’s going to do is remove it, or even better (sarcasm), warn the person…

I am not asking for a smart ass remark, I am asking MOPAR if they would think about pushing a new registering of a server rule, as the have to put forums or client links (that actually work)…[/quote]
What if it is online in beta environment and for that reason there are no forums made available yet,
or maybe they are switching forums or are forums still under development.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @ChelseaGrin ChelseaGrin
item.description:
@ChelseaGrin wrote:

All that’s going to do is remove it, or even better (sarcasm), warn the person…

I am not asking for a smart ass remark, I am asking MOPAR if they would think about pushing a new registering of a server rule, as the have to put forums or client links (that actually work)…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“ChelseaGrin, post:3, topic:525001”]Then it shouldn’t be added… Who doesn’t have forums? Shouldn’t that be the FIRST thing you think about after making a client?

It’s wasting space, they add a “server” to that area, then doesn’t add a forums link, webclient, or Downloaded Client … It’s a joke, and it pisses a lot of people off…[/quote]

Then report the advertisements.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

If a server doesn’t have forums, then they are bound to fail.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @ChelseaGrin ChelseaGrin
item.description:
@ChelseaGrin wrote:

Then it shouldn’t be added… Who doesn’t have forums? Shouldn’t that be the FIRST thing you think about after making a client?

It’s wasting space, they add a “server” to that area, then doesn’t add a forums link, webclient, or Downloaded Client … It’s a joke, and it pisses a lot of people off…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status [Read More]
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Because not all servers have forums to link to.

Read full topic
